articles.title: How to Give Kids Gifts With Real Value
articles.description: Choosing a meaningful gift for a child — one they truly connect with and value — can be more challenging than it seems.

articles.title: Chicago House Party Shooting Leaves 13 Wounded, 4 Critically, Police Say
articles.description: The party was part of a memorial for a person who was killed in April, the authorities said.
articles.content:
Thirteen people were wounded, four critically, in a shooting in Chicago early on Sunday morning, the authorities said.
The shooting took place just after 12:30 a.m. in the Englewood neighborhood at a house party being given in memorial of a subject slain in … [+402 chars]

articles.author: Maria Cramer
articles.title: Another Benefit to Going to Museums? You May Live Longer
articles.description: Researchers in Britain found that people who go to museums, the theater and the opera were less likely to die in the study period than those who didn’t.
articles.content:
Many studies have examined the positive effects of the arts on older people.
Americans over 55 who did not create art or go to concerts, museums or plays reported higher rates of hypertension and cognitive decline than those who did, according to a study of … [+1648 chars]

articles.title: A Holocaust Survivor Now Struggling to Pay Rent
articles.description: Zoltan Matyash witnessed “the worst of human agony” at Auschwitz and Buchenwald. Now he and his wife, Mera, are trying to get by on a fixed income in Borough Park, Brooklyn.
